All Implemented Interfaces:
Printable, Weapon, Purchasable, Sellable
public class Broadsword extends WeaponItem implements Sellable, Purchasable
Class representing the Broadsword weapon that can be used to attack the enemy. Created by:

  • Method Details

    • resetFocusTurn

      public void resetFocusTurn()
      Reset the attribute 'remainingFocusTurn' to 5

    • tick

      public void tick(Location currentLocation)
      Inform Broadsword on the ground of the passage of time. This method is called once per turn, if Broadsword rests upon the ground. When the broadsword is on the ground and it is still activated. It means that the player just dropped it last turn. It should be inactivated by reverting everything back to default.
      Overrides:
      tick in class Item
      Parameters:
      currentLocation - The location of the ground on which we lie.

    • tick

      public void tick(Location currentLocation, Actor actor)
      Inform a carried Item(Broadsword) of the passage of time. This method is called once per turn, if Broadsword is being carried. When the broad sword is in player's inventory, the duration of the focus effect should be reduced by 1 if it has been activated
      Overrides:
      tick in class Item
      Parameters:
      currentLocation - The location of the actor carrying Broadsword
      actor - The actor carrying Broadsword

    • allowableActions

      public ActionList allowableActions(Actor owner)
      List of allowable actions that the item can perform to the current actor Player can use 'Focus' skill as long as this broad sword is in the inventory.
      Overrides:

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      an unmodifiable list of Actions
